Title: Sponge - SharePoint Framework
Description: Sponge is a SharePoint Framework that contains centralized logging and configuration, as well as other useful Controls, Web Parts and Application Pages.
HomeWiki:
Sponge (beta)

Sponge - SharePoint 2010 Framework.

The idea behind Sponge is pretty simple - provide centralized logging and configuration components, as well as other useful tools, controls, web parts and application pages that makes the life's of developers and administrators a lot simplier!

Sponge includes the following components:

  • Centralized Configuration Component
  • Centralized Logging Component
  • Site Property Manager
  • Web Parts
    • Hosting Web Part
    • Shoutbox Web Part
    • Weather Web Part
    • TreeView Web Part
    • Aggregation Web Part (todo)
    • Google Maps Web Part (todo)
    • Youtube Web Part (todo)
  • Custom Actions
    • Copy List Item
    • Multi Approve Documents
  • etc
